results.title: Metformin Enhances Doxycycline Efficacy Against Pasteurella multocida: Evidence from In Vitro, In Vivo, and Morphological Studies.
results.text_hl: These findings highlight @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a potent, low-@DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ @CHEMICAL_Tetracycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013752 @@@tetracycline@@@ adjuvant with cross-species efficacy, offering a promising therapeutic approach for managing @CHEMICAL_Tetracycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013752 @@@tetracycline@@@-resistant @<m>DISEASE_Pasteurella_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010326 @@@Pm infections@@@.
